Uses of Interface
voldemort.store.StorageConfiguration

Packages that use StorageConfiguration
voldemort.store.bdb A storage engine that persists data in BDB JE. 
voldemort.store.memory An in-memory storage engine that serves data out of a non-persistent map. 
voldemort.store.mysql A storage engine that persists data in a mysql instance. 
voldemort.store.readonly A storage engine that provides very efficient read-only access to large sorted files of data. 
voldemort.store.views Classes related to Views and server side transforms 
 

Uses of StorageConfiguration in voldemort.store.bdb
 

Classes in voldemort.store.bdb that implement StorageConfiguration
 class BdbStorageConfiguration
          The configuration that is shared between berkeley db instances.
 

Uses of StorageConfiguration in voldemort.store.memory
 

Classes in voldemort.store.memory that implement StorageConfiguration
 class CacheStorageConfiguration
          Identical to the InMemoryStorageConfiguration except that it creates google collections ReferenceMap with Soft references on both keys and values.
 class InMemoryStorageConfiguration
          A storage engine that uses a java.util.ConcurrentHashMap to hold the entries
